title: Remote.co Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape remote jobs from Remote.co. Provide either keyword/location/category OR a Remote.co search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Remote.co search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Developer', 'Marketing Manager', 'Data Analyst'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Location (Remote.co mostly lists remote positions; leave empty for global results).

category.title: Category (optional)
category.description: Optional job category to filter by (as used on Remote.co).

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for the best results.

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).
